introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Zapiens. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before proceeding.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: In these Terms and Conditions, the following terms shall have the following meanings:
definitions.item1: "Platform" refers to the Zapiens website, mobile applications, and all related services.
definitions.item2: "User" refers to any individual or entity that accesses or uses the Platform.
definitions.item3: "Content" refers to all materials, including but not limited to text, images, and data available on the Platform.

usage.title: Usage Terms
usage.content: By using Zapiens, you agree to:
usage.item1: Provide accurate and complete information when creating an account.
usage.item2: Maintain the security of your account and not share your credentials.
usage.item3: Use the Platform in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. We collect and process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using Zapiens, you consent to such processing.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at support@zapiens.com.
